alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range; Big Hole Mountains; Caribou Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 04 at 3:49AM MDT until November 05 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total accumulation of 12 to 20 inches with spotty amounts near 25 inches are likely. For Swan Valley, 4 to 8 inches is expected. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph, especially in the mountains. * WHERE...Wayan, Swan Valley, Palisades, Victor, Emigration Summit, and Pine Creek Pass. * WHEN...From 6 PM Friday to 9 PM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow and reduced visibility are expected, even with snow being wet.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bear River Range; Big Hole Mountains; Caribou Range
